channel.title: Pi bankall command
channel.description: does any1 know how to make a bankall command cuz my deposit all dc's me tyvm if u help me

item.title: Pi bankall command
item.dc:creator: @iswhoopie iswhoopie
item.description:
@iswhoopie wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:454648”]Lmfao!

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i--) { if (c.playerItems[i] > 0 && c.playerItemsN[i] > 0) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i, c.playerItemsN[i]); } didnt work } break;

This should work, I don’t remember how I did it. Been a minute since I’ve worked on a PI.

EDIT: Added a check to the code[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Pi bankall command
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Lmfao!

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for (int i = 0; i < c.playerItems.length; i--) { if (c.playerItems[i] > 0 && c.playerItemsN[i] > 0) { c.getItems().bankItem(c.playerItems[i], i, c.playerItemsN[i]); } } break;

This should work, I don’t remember how I did it. Been a minute since I’ve worked on a PI.

EDIT: Added a check to the code

item.description:
@iswhoopie wrote:

AtomicInt_:

post your deposit function.

case 89223: //Deposit Inventory for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); } } break;
